title: [近貼新書] 神奇女俠漫畫分享 討論

replies.msg:
Rebirth之後Wonder Woman(WW)每個月出兩期. 大約兩個甚至三個禮拜一期.
我獻醜試下每期都寫內容簡介, 感想, 評價等.
無如意外星期三出書我當晚就會睇. 星期四再上黎分享.

平時就貼下同WW有關既新聞. 漫畫, 電影, 等等乜都貼下.
雖然套電影叫做所謂取得成功, 但係睇每個月sales就知根本就冇吸引到多d人睇WW漫畫
所以都預左自推, 不過暫時重有熱情, 點都捱到下年1月. 因為到時Vanessa漫畫回歸, 其實都係因為佢隔左咁多年再出現, 我先決定開個咁既post.
正如Geoff Johns所講, Rebirth係將N52失去左既legacy帶返黎.
WW Rebirth後黎到第三個作者, 三個都帶返晒pre n52既人物出黎再用黎重新寫過故事又好似真係做到呢樣野.
當然我冇話d故仔好好睇
小智?

貼下之前既post

[美漫 分享] 海格力斯與神奇女俠
https://lihkg.com/thread/438191/page/1

[美漫分享] 神奇女俠 一人的正義聯盟 JLA: A League of One
https://lihkg.com/thread/294395/page/1

今個禮拜雖然冇WW主刊, 但係相關既書都有幾本.
不過暫時都係集中講返主刊. 因為其他書我就唔係本本有睇, 而且唔係本本都係主世界
有冇睇bombshell?

漏左樣好重要冇講, 就係我唔肯定自己所講既係絕對正確.
所以一來有錯請指正, 二來大家睇完都唔好當係岩晒.

有冇睇bombshell?

就係冇

有冇睇bombshell?

就係冇

我都冇 啲statue好靚

今個禮拜有本Wonder Woman Conan #2
內容就唔講, 因為我冇睇
但係有樣野可以講下.
呢個系列同Dark Horse合作.
作者係Gail Simone, 畫家係Aaron Lopresti.
而呢對組合正正就係創作Infinite crisis後relaunch左既WW vol.3 #20-41
所以上個月我立一立#1, 真係好撚有果個時期既感覺
點解Diana去左Conan世界我冇細仔睇.
但係果時vol.3 #20-23既故事Ends of the Earth就係講Diana去左另一個世界.
而果個故事我覺得好麻麻, 所以影響左我暫時冇去睇呢本新書Wonder Woman Conan

有冇睇bombshell?

就係冇

我都冇 啲statue好靚

呢d算唔算elseworld.
另一本Gotham City Garage果個WW好撚型.
有一刻諗過買呢個

We realize that actually there is no way that Wonder Woman will ever give up mankind.

The reason why she left the island was because she want to make their life better and safer, there are the calling, they are her calling.

And so I'm giving a very honest answer, there was sometimes you know, you made a process, you established something that is not necessary the right decision but then you can always correct it and change it.

So Wonder Woman will always be there as far as you concern about mankind.

gal越講越多. bvs幾時出個版本cut走果句.

despite her depiction in Batman v Superman, Wonder Woman is now intended to have always been active during the whole 20th century before meeting Batman…

“Well unfortunately there’s not much we can share with you about Wonder Woman 2,” Gadot says when asked about these differences in presentation and how it will influence the Wonder Woman sequel. “But what is clear is that whether or not Wonder Woman was out there or incognito, she was always involved and she was always very active in Man’s World, and she was always acting to save and to help, and to better the world.”

好慘 不過我覺得佢講得冇錯
果時套電視WW我覺得咪即係好似宜家既supergirl咁
果時我都好期待套WW電視劇

WW #34 Children of the god part 3

上回#32(冇錯, 因為WW又再次單雙期數分開講唔同故事.)講到Diana透過Hercules遺物終於搵到twin brother Jason.
今回一開始就回憶返Jason出世果時. 原來係Philippus根據Hippolyta指示將Jason交俾另一個希臘神話人物Glaucus並委託佢將Jason養大成人.

返到黎現在, Diana為同Jason相認感到高興. Jason表示因為Glaucus既解答一直都知道自己同Diana既關係亦有留意Diana既英雄事跡. 不過佢應承Glaucus唔會去搵Diana.
Jason一樣識飛, 不過佢就話唔係所有Diana既能力佢都有. 亦有d能力佢有而Diana冇.

Jason雖然知道Hippolyta為左保護自己免受親父Zeus妻子Hera傷害所以送走佢. 不過始於唔明點解Hippolyta從來唔搵佢. Diana話自己都係最近先知Themyscira唔係咁簡單就可以自由出入.

兩個人交流左好多事情, Diana亦講出因為Hercules俾Darkseid個女Grail殺死所以佢搵到Jason. Jason都認識同受過Hercules指導如何戰鬥.

呢個時候Grail突然出現攻擊Diana. 原來Jason只係假裝同Diana友好. 佢一直都非常憎恨Diana. 受到二人夾擊初頭Diana都重頂得住. 但係Jason展示佢遺傳自Zeus控制氣壓既能力用海嘯重撃. Diana都抵擋唔住而俾Grail插傷.

另一邊廂, Steve得知早前俾Diana成功阻止既Giganta所打算偷走既文物部份金屬成份竟然係黎自Apokolips...

下回#36繼續.

一個字: 弱.
唔識飛真係好慘.

Amazon表現完全收貨. 係逃出山洞果幕好撚柒.
Hippolyta通知Diana果場戲冇辦法唔俾100分. 最深刻就係呢場.

本身好期待既WW/BATMAN書終於黎喇.
The Brave and the Bold: Batman and Wonder Woman 6期書2月開始連載.
Liam Sharp話本書係接rebirth主線.
但係 He said Wonder Woman and her classic supporting character Steve Trevor are still a couple, but that he was tempted to add a little of the romantic spark that has existed between Batman and Wonder Woman over the years in various adaptations.

咁就唔知想點
紅袍, 呢套JL都有幕WW配紅袍

WW 2月內容

WONDER WOMAN #40
Written by JAMES ROBINSON
Art by EMANUELA LUPACCHINO and RAY McCARTHY
Cover by JESUS MERINO
Variant cover by JENNY FRISON
“SWAN’S SONG” finale! Wonder Woman fights to break Silver Swan out of her mania and stop her all-out assault. Will Wonder Woman be able to get through, or will she lose her friend to the madness in the process?
On sale FEBRUARY 14 • 32 pg, FC, $2.99 US • RATED T

WONDER WOMAN #41
Written by JAMES ROBINSON
Art by CARLO PAGULAYAN and JASON PAZ
Cover by BRYAN HITCH
Variant cover by JENNY FRISON
“AMAZONS ATTACKED” part one! The Gods separated Themyscira from the world for a good reason: it serves as the prison for the God of War, and the most powerful army ever created stands guard around him! So what happens when the greatest evil in the universe decides he wants that army for himself?
On sale FEBRUARY 28 • 32 pg, FC, $2.99 US • RATED T
